CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 24, 1945, pg. 23, reads: "First Timers - The faithful came out en masse on Christmas Eve to be on hand for the official opening of the Continental Bar in Crawford Grill No. 2 [1]. Bottom: A crowd of merry-makers put the okay stamp on the new room." - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group including Dolores Thompson Slater wearing dark coat, Mildred "Pinky" Greenway, William "Woogie" Harris, Robert E. "Pappy" Williams, Mary Louise Harris Lewis, Johnnie Black, Charles Lewis, and possibly Joe Robinson, in Continental Bar in Crawford Grill No. 1
